description:
Share files and apps via browser with a solution to apps with multiple APK files
Share files and apps using browser. you need the other device to be connected to the same network.
Files sent from browser to the app can be found in Sharing/ folder in your internal storage.
You will need to send this app to the other device in case you sent an app with split apk files.
Make sure you use hotspot to get faster speeds transferring files.

All thanks goes to Hamdy El-Menshawy for the UI design specially the web side
App made by Ammar64
